results.name: Smallest prime factor of A282704.
comment: By construction, a(n) == 3 (mod 4) and a(n) > prime(n).
reference: T. M. Apostol, Introduction to Analytic Number Theory, Springer-Verlag, 1976, page 147.
link: Hans Havermann, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..97
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 26 2017
ext: Corrected and extended by _Hans Havermann_, Mar 12 2017
